title: What is React Native
description:
React Native is an open-source framework created by Facebook (now Meta) that allows developers to build mobile applications using JavaScript and React. 
It enables developers to create apps for multiple platforms, such as iOS and Android, using a single codebase, making the development process faster and more efficient. 

Key features of React Native include: 
Cross-platform Development: 
Code once, and deploy on both iOS and Android, reducing development time and effort. 
Native Performance: 
React Native components are rendered as native widgets, giving apps nearly native performance. 
Hot Reloading: 
Allows developers to see the results of code changes instantly without rebuilding the entire app. 
Large Ecosystem: 
React Native has a large community of developers, libraries, and tools that make it easier to build apps. 
Component-based Structure: 
React Native, like React, is built on reusable components, making it easy to manage and scale applications.
